title: bukkit服务器 错误求解
author: etforict
txt_content:
本帖最后由 etforict 于 2012-4-7 10:05 编辑 


11:59 PM [INFO] tianhan [/220.245.100.11:57435] logged in with entity id 921 at ([World One] 190.90813336978073, 63.0, 277.76245433394445) 
11:59 PM [INFO] tianhan lost connection: disconnect.overflow 
11:59 PM [INFO] Connection reset 
11:59 PM [SEVERE] java.net.SocketException: Socket closed 
11:59 PM [SEVERE] at java.net.SocketOutputStream.socketWrite(Unknown Source) 
11:59 PM [SEVERE] at java.net.SocketOutputStream.write(Unknown Source) 
11:59 PM [SEVERE] at java.io.BufferedOutputStream.flushBuffer(Unknown Source) 
11:59 PM [SEVERE] at java.io.BufferedOutputStream.flush(Unknown Source) 
11:59 PM [SEVERE] at java.io.DataOutputStream.flush(Unknown Source) 
11:59 PM [SEVERE] at net.minecraft.server.NetworkWriterThread.run(SourceFile:103) 复制代码


快崩溃了。。。自己进自己的服务器木有问题，上星期还好好的，这星期别人都连不了了，一连上就掉
然后服务器就显示这些错误
国外论坛都翻遍了，我以下是我的设置参数


系统 window 7 64bit 
        JAVA 7
内存 分配最低1g 最高2g
连接方式 bukkit 1.2.4 （2126）端口映射 端口为（25565）


上星期一点事都木有，就这星期出事了。。。。
望高手解答

replies.author: strawmaine
replies.txt_content: 自己有金币不去买道具还求神马高亮。。。
